dialog: What do you do for a living? I'm a weight lifter, so I eat a lot of meat.
I work at a grocery store as a stocker.  I love meat!  What is your favorite meat?
I love a good steak.  What about you?  What do you like to eat?
I like steak too!  I also like chicken and seafood.  Do you have any hobbies?
I like to play video games and watch movies.  How about you, what do you do for fun?
I love playing video games as well.  I play a lot of Call of Duty.
I used to play call of duty a lot, but I haven't played in a while.
I have played it since it came out in 2007.  It is a great game.
Yeah, it's been a while since I've played it. I think it's time for me to get back into it.
You should, it is a lot of fun.  Do you have any other games you like to play?
That's true, but I like it. I read a lot of Stephen King books.
I have read a few of his books as well. He is one of my favorite authors.
He's a great author. Have you read any of his short stories or novellas?
No, I haven't. Do you have any recommendations for a good one to read?
I would recommend "The Catcher in the Rye". It's a classic.
I'll have to check it out. I'm always looking for new books to get into.
I highly recommend it. It's one of my favorite books of all time. It was published in 1937.
Thank you for the recommendation! I'll add it to my to-do list.
You're welcome. I hope you enjoy it as much as I do. It is a great read.
I'm sure I will. I've been reading a lot of Stephen King books lately.
That sounds like a lot of fun! Do you have any hobbies that you like to do?
I like to go to the beach and listen to the waves crash on the shore. How about you?
Yes, I love to draw. I've been drawing since I was a child. What about you?
I don't have much time to draw, but I do like to listen to music. What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite band is the Beach Boys. Do you have a favorite band?
Not really, I listen to a lot of different types of music though. What do you do for a living?
I work in an office. What about you? Do you work or go to school?
I'm currently unemployed, but I used to work in a call center. What kind of office do you work in?
I work for an insurance company. What type of work did you do in the call center?
I was a customer service representative, so I dealt directly with customers. How long have you been working there?
Breakfast is the most important meal of the day. It's the first meal you eat in the morning.
I agree. I love eating breakfast. I usually eat it before I go to work. What about you?
I don't eat breakfast, but I do eat a lot of oatmeal for breakfast.
That's a good choice too. I like to eat eggs and bacon for breakfast most of the time.
Breakfast is the most important meal of the day, so I eat it a lot.
I agree, it's important to get your nutrition in order so you don't get sick.
Yes, it is very important for your body to get all the nutrients you need.
Yes it is, and it's also important to make sure you get enough vitamins and minerals.
Yes, you need to get everything you need for your health and well-being.
I agree, it's very important to get the right nutrition for the body.
That's really nice of you. I live far away from my family too, but they visit me often.
I'm sorry to hear that.  I hope you get to see them soon.  Family is important.
Thank you, I appreciate that. It's been a long time since I've seen them.
You're welcome.  It's always nice to get together with family.  What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games with my brothers and sisters. Do you have any hobbies?
Video games are a lot of fun.  I love to play Call of Duty.  How about you?
I love playing video games as well. I'm a big fan of Fortnite.
I've never heard of that one.  What kind of game is it?  Is it a first person shooter?
Yes, it's a first-person shooter. It was released in November of 2016.
I'll have to check it out.  I'm always looking for new games to play.
